client.map.model.handlers

Class HexHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.map.model.handlers.HexHandler

  • public class HexHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores and manages the hexes contained in a map.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler
